mapper.insert: insert into TOM_EB_RECORD (CODE, UPDATE_TIME, EXCHANGE_NUMBER, ROAD) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{exchangeNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{road,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into TOM_EB_RECORD
CODE,
UPDATE_TIME,
EXCHANGE_NUMBER,
ROAD,
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{exchangeNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{road,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select * from TOM_EB_RECORD where CODE = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by update_time desc limit #{startNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{endNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select count(*) from TOM_EB_RECORD where UPDATE_TIME BETWEEN #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and ROAD ='1'
